gobblin.source.extractor.extract

Class QueryBasedSource<S,D>

  • java.lang.Object
    • gobblin.source.extractor.extract.AbstractSource<S,D>
      • gobblin.source.extractor.extract.QueryBasedSource<S,D>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Source<S,D>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MysqlSource, OracleSource, SqlServerSource, TeradataSource

    public abstract class QueryBasedSource<S,D>
extends AbstractSource<S,D>
    A base implementation of Source for query-based sources.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  QueryBasedSource.SourceEntity
      A class that encapsulates a source entity (aka dataset) to be processed
